00050     struct testEq {
00051         bool operator()(const std::string& s1, const std::string& s2) const
00052         {
00053             if (s1.length() < s2.length()) return true;
00054             if (s1.length() > s2.length()) return false;
00055             return s1 < s2;
00056         }
00057     };
00058     
00059     typedef std::map<std::string, size_t, testEq> TestsMap;
00060
